
## Dunnett's procedure for comparing all treatments with a control

```{r DataName.Dunnett}
library(multcomp)
library(broom)
DataName.Dunnett = glht(DataName.lm, linfct = mcp(FactorName = "Dunnett"))
tidy(summary(DataName.Dunnett))
cld(DataName.Dunnett)
```

```{r plotDataName.Dunnett, fig.cap="Plot of Tukey's HSD for ResponseName grouped by FactorName."}
plot(DataName.Dunnett)
```
